amendment.description: To provide emergency agricultural disaster assistance.

action.text: Amendment SA 5144 proposed by Senator Conrad.
Point of order that an emergency designation within the amendment violates the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 5144.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 5144 (the section within the amendment regarding an emergency designation) made in Senate.
Point of order withdrawn in Senate with respect to amendment SA 5144.
Proposed amendment SA 5144 withdrawn in Senate.
